strings.Value: "So, King Irovetti invited you for a visit? I have the perfect gift for him!" {n}With a smug look, Linzi shows you a thin paperback.{/n}

"Look through it when you have the time. The entire truth of the {g|Academy of Grand Arts}Academy of Grand Arts{/g} and its so-called patron, Irovetti. I hope it gives him a stroke when he reads it — then all your problems will have solved themselves!"

"Look through it when you have the time. The entire {d|Linzi Book True}truth{/d} of the {g|Academy of Grand Arts}Academy of Grand Arts{/g} — the truth about what the students, teachers, headmaster, and their great patron Irovetti himself are doing behind their pretty facade!"

"The first press run is already on its way to {g|Pitax}Pitax{/g}. When you go, don't forget to take me with you — I want to see the effects of the book Professor Eobald and I wrote with my own eyes. I'm sure it'll be explosive!"
